question:
You have just moved into a new home and are planning to hold a party. You are worried that the noise may disturb your neighbour.

Write a letter to your neighbour. In your letter

introduce yourself

describe your plans for the party

invite your neighbour to come
text: I'm Masi.the new neighbour that just moved beside you.I'm writing this letter in order to invite you to my party which will have been taken this weekend in my flat.

Firstly,It would be my pleasure to say I've been graduated from the university last week and I'm planning an event for this purpose. hence I've seen you in our faculty, and l thought we might know each other .

Secondly, as our gathering would be in the evening.I was wondering if nosiness would cause some irritation to you moreover,I'd be really glad to interact with you more, as well as all attendees, are peers from the college,I guess it would be more entertaining for you rather than stay at home and stand with our loud music.
To tell the long story short,do not waste any time my friend. I bet it would be enjoyable for you so I definitely   Waiting for you.
